Adam Lashinsky, Fortune, interviews the leader of one of the most important companies in the modern financial and communication worlds – Pony Ma, Co-founder, Chairman, and CEO of Tencent. In an insightful interview, Ma shares the genius behind Tencent’s WeChat – the Swiss Army knife of the Chinese digital world.
